name: single_dog_breed
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dogbreeddb.
Tool description: Get the basic metadata on all breeds of dogs from around the world. Check out encurate.app to manage content on your mobile apps. Contact to feature your app on encurate.app website.
API description: Fetches details of a single dog breed from the DogBreedDB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the dog breed to fetch details for.
